title: LunchTime
description: React Native App that tracks your diet during COVID with computer vision and using AI to help you find healthy, new recipes you'll love.

title: Alternate
description: 2D Platformer where the player has to switch between alternate realities in order to traverse the map.

title: Bots Alike
description: Control two bots at once while trying to complete tasks.

title: Vroom Vroom
description: My first game! Drive through the streets while dodging traffic!
